entry.title: 懒加载
entry.content: 定义一个懒加载的宏#define DYJ_LAZY(object, assignment) (object = object ?: assignment) 使用- (UINavigationBar *)navBar{ return DYJ_LAZY(_navBar, ({ UINavigationBar *bar = [[UINavigationBar alloc] init]; bar.barStyle = UINavigationBar.appearance.barStyle; bar.translucent = YES; [self.view addSubview:bar]; [bar setFrame:CGRectMake(0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, 64)]; bar; }));}
